testing.name: conflict_check2
testing.description: a request waits for another write request to complete
testing.expected_db_content: conflict_check2.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 4}

old.name: dev
old.expected_db_content: dev.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('employee', '1', 'history'): 'bank A'}

old.name: conflict_check2
old.description: a request waits for another write request to complete
old.expected_db_content: conflict_check2.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 4}

old.name: subject attribute conflict
old.description: a request evaluation aborts due to a conflict on a subject attribute
old.expected_db_content: db_sub_attr_conflict.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('employee', '1', 'history'): 'bank A'}

old.name: abortion due to tentative update
old.description: a request evaluation aborts due to dependency on a tentative update
old.expected_db_content: db_tentative_update_abortion.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('employee', '1', 'history'): 'bank A'}

old.name: write starvation
old.description: a request evaluation aborts due to a conflict on a resource attribute
old.expected_db_content: write_starvation.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 2}

old.name: read write no starvation
old.description: a write request waits for another write request to complete
old.expected_db_content: read_write_no_starvation.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 4}

old.name: read write starvation
old.description: a write request waits for another write request to complete
old.expected_db_content: read_write_starvation.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 4}

old.name: misprediction
old.description: a request waits for another write request to complete
old.expected_db_content: misprediction.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 4}

old.name: wait for tentative evals to complete
old.description: a request evaluation is delayed because it depends on a tentative update by a request that has not yet committed or aborted
old.expected_db_content: wait_tentative_update_completion.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('employee', '1', 'history'): 'bank A'}

old.name: random resource attribute conflict
old.description: a request evaluation might abort due to a conflict on a resource attribute
old.expected_db_content: write_starvation_rand.log contains final db state. expected db_dump:{('movie', 'A', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'C', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'B', 'viewed'): 'true', ('movie', 'B', 'viewCount'): 1, ('movie', 'C', 'viewCount'): 1, ('movie', 'A', 'viewCount'): 4}

old.name: stress test
old.description: a test to keep all the process (client, sub_coord, res_coord, worker, db busy at the same time)
old.expected_db_content: stress_truth contains expected results and the db_stress_test.log contains final db state
